gaps_addressed:
UNCOMPLETED ROADMAP ITEMS for v0.6 (6):
  - Auto-sleep on quota exhaustion, auto-resume when quota recovers
  - Failure pattern analysis: detect repeated failures on the same gap, skip or re-approach
  - Gate mechanism: pause and request human approval on high-risk changes
  - Health monitoring: track module performance vs seed baseline
  - Graceful degradation: fall back to seed if a module starts failing
  - All code passes full quality pipeline

Iteration #16 complete. Here's what was built:

**Failure pattern analysis** (v0.6 roadmap item)

### New files (7)
| File | Purpose |
|---|---|
| `modules/failure_analyzer/__init__.py` | Module package |

| `modules/failure_analyzer/SPEC.md` | v0.6 implementation spec |
| `modules/failure_analyzer/core.py` | `analyze_patterns(history, current_gaps) → tuple[FailurePattern, ...]` |
| `modules/failure_analyzer/tests/__init__.py` | Test package |

| File | Change |
|---|---|
| `domain/models.py` | Added `FailureAction` enum (`SKIP`, `REAPPROACH`) and `FailurePattern` frozen dataclass |
| `modules/gap_analyzer/core.py` | Integrated failure analysis — stuck gaps get `[STUCK — skip]` or `[STUCK — try a different approach]` annotations |
| `modules/gap_analyzer/tests/test_gap_analyzer.py` | 3 new test
